human-task-control-plane-credential-bund.title: Stage control-plane credential bundle for pairing
human-task-control-plane-credential-bund.description: Gather the Cloudflare tunnel certs, nghtshft.ai API tokens, and Monday sandbox tokens the pairing bootstrap uses. Place the bundle in the operator vault + ~/.config/systemd env files so the backend can hand them to POST /register-agent when pairing completes.

env-task-dns-nebulapulse.title: Provision DNS/TLS for preview.nebulapulse.local
env-task-dns-nebulapulse.description: Add preview.nebulapulse.local A/AAAA + wildcard SAN certs so Traefik can terminate HTTPS. Coordinate with the ops DNS team to publish the records, request a preview.nebulapulse.local/*.preview.nebulapulse.local certificate (Let's Encrypt or Cloudflare), drop the crt/key into /etc/traefik/certs on preview.nebulapulse.local, and reload Traefik so the registry entry can move out of 'planned'. Share the certificate thumbprint in #nightshift-ops when done.

env-task-credentials-nightshift.title: Sync Nightshift dev host credentials
env-task-credentials-nightshift.description: Sync the SSH keys + secrets referenced in data/environments.json for env-nightshift-dev. Verify the pi-dev.nightshift.local host has the operator SSH keys installed, refresh the password store/Vault entries that Nightshift references (Agent API token, Traefik dashboard creds, rsync backup keys), and confirm scripts/environments.py show env-nightshift-dev reports active credentials.

env-task-tls-nightshift.title: Install TLS certs for nightshift-dev router
env-task-tls-nightshift.description: Request/renew the *.nightshift.local certificates referenced by metadata.router.tls, copy the crt/key into data/router/certs on the dev host, and reload Traefik so HTTPS works for pi-dev.nightshift.local.
